task completion.description: Degree to which the task is completed successfully

action validity.description: Actions must be chosen from the given available actions, with illegitimate actions taken into account

thought process.description: The quality of the thought process and planning throughout the task

systematic search.description: How systematically the player searched for items and target locations

interaction flow.description: The smoothness and continuity of interactions with the environment

task time.description: The time taken to accomplish the task

planning strategy.description: Quality of the devised plan for completing the task

action efficiency.description: Efficiency of the chosen actions in solving the task

response format.description: Adherence to the required response format

adaptability to feedback.description: Ability to adapt and modify the plan based on the environment's feedback

termination judgment.description: Proper judgment of when to reply with 'TERMINATE'

efficiency.description: Assesses the number of steps taken in comparison to the minimum possible steps required to complete the task

problem solving.description: The ability to quickly identify and adapt to changes in the environment during task execution

target handling.description: How well the player followed instructions for handling the target household

environment understanding.description: The ability to understand the provided environment description and identify relevant objects

compliance with instructions.description: Adherence to specific rules and instructions such as reply formatting and termination conditions

legal actions.description: Selecting actions from the given available actions and avoiding illegal actions

target acquisition.description: Acquiring the target household object immediately after finding it

format adherence.description: The extent to which the output format is strictly followed

problem understanding.description: Understanding of the given task and relevance of the environment

action selection.description: Choosing the appropriate sequence and type of actions
